customer_addr:
300 EAST BLACK CREEK ROAD
EAST EARL, PA 17519

citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
The facility representative disclosed that primary enclosures for dogs are spot-cleaned daily using a detergent, but are
sanitized monthly with a disinfectant. Primary enclosures must be sanitized at least once every 2 weeks using a
prescribed method as inadequate sanitization may promote growth and spread of pathogens. The facility must address
the frequency of sanitization to minimize disease hazards.
Correct by May 28, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
Additional Inspectors:
ROBERT MARKMANN, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOR n

narrative:
3.11(b)(2) 
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
The facility representative disclosed that primary enclosures for dogs are spot-cleaned daily using a detergent, but are 
sanitized monthly with a disinfectant. Primary enclosures must be sanitized at least once every 2 weeks using a 
prescribed method as inadequate sanitization may promote growth and spread of pathogens. The facility must address 
the frequency of sanitization to minimize disease hazards. 
 
Correct by May 28, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
ROBERT MARKMANN, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOR n
